snippet: Iran’s agreement to new nuclear talks are welcome. But the only way to achieve a deal is for the international community to keep up the economic pressure.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Iran's agreement to hold a new round of nuclear talks, but contends that the international community must refrain from lifting economic sanctions until Iran's obligations under the Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty are fully met.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s agreement to new nuclear talks are welcome. But the only way to achieve a deal is for the international community to keep up the economic pressure.
